name: sdk.makemula.ai
description: makemula.ai js sdk and client-side optimization toolkit

scripts.build: npm run-script build -w svelte-components && npm run gulp
scripts.version: auto-changelog -p -l false --template keepachangelog && git add . && git commit -m "chore(release): update CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.postversion: git tag sdk-v$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')

author: kale.mcnaney@offlinestudio.com
